source_original:
The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

source_original:
The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

source_original:
The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

source_article: You will be punished p.166 HRW report December 2009 http://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/reports/drc1209web_1.pdf
source_original:
The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

source_original:
The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

You will be punished p.158 HRW report December 2009 http://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/reports/drc1209web_1.pdf
source_original:
The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by

at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.

received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

Rwandan Hutu rebels said kill over 30 civilians in eastern DRCongo 
349 words 
29 January 2009 
19:38 
BBC Monitoring Africa 
English 
(c) 2009 The British Broadcasting Corporation. All Rights Reserved. No material may be reproduced except with the express permission of The British Broadcasting Corporation.
You will be punished p.156 HRW report December 2009 http://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/reports/drc1209web_1.pdf
source_original:
The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.

source_article: You will be punished p.159-161 HRW report December 2009 http://www.hrw.org/sites/default/files/reports/drc1209web_1.pdf
source_original:
The information in the following tables is based on eyewitness accounts, information from
family members, and testimony from those who helped to bury the dead. It was collected by
Human Rights Watch during 23 field missions in North and South Kivu between January and
October 2009. In many cases, the victims were identified by name. This information is on file
at Human Rights Watch. We have made every effort to corroborate our findings and dismiss
accounts that we did not find credible.
This information is only partial and represents some of those killed. Human Rights Watch
received credible information about additional civilians killed which we have not been able
to verify nor were we able to visit all areas affected by the military operations.
